channel.title: Books on ripx80 onexec
channel.description: Recent content in Books on ripx80 onexec

item.description: only for self tracking and keep motivated to read more. reading hegels world (hegels welt) - juergen kaube think in systems - donella h. meadows auris - vincent kliesch win (nichts bleibt begraben) - harlan coben < pipe ego is the enemy - ryan holiday do the work - steven pressfield 365 days with self discipline - martin meadows ignore everybody - hugh macleod the war of art - steven pressfield moonwalking with einstein - joshua foer how to take smart notes - söhnke ahrens the dragonbone chair - tad williams the first law - joe abercrombie best served cold (racheklingen) - joe abercrombie blood song (das lied des blutes) - anthony ryan paradise (das verlorene paradies) - abdulrazak gurnah great expectations (große erwartungen) - charles dickens more from tad williams 2024 goal: 1/10
